review: Unlike most people who would buy a Chromecast, I own a Smart TV. Yes, a lot of the functionality of the Chromecast overlaps the smart TV, but the Chromecast gives me a couple of functions I don't get from the TV.First, I have a lower-end Samsung Smart TV, and every time I turn it on, I'm greeted by a blank black screen. The Chromecast background gives me a nice default photo slideshow when I turn on my TV.Secondly, I use Plex Media Server at home, and the Chromecast allows me to play movies remotely or when visiting friends and family.For most users with a Smart TV, the Chromecast is an unnecessary expense. But if either of the situations listed above applies to you, it's well worth the purchase price.
